title: Remember When: Celebrity Treasure Island first aired
content:encoded:
It all started in 2001 when Pieta Keating jumped from winning the first season of normie Treasure Island to hosting the same show only jam-packed with Aotearoa's finest early 00s celebs. Now, with the show about to enter an all new season, join us as we remember when Celebrity Treasure Island began.


Join the Real Pod community!

Join The Real Pod Corner on Facebook

Join our Discord server

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes.author: The Spinoff
itunes.subtitle: We look back on the first season of Aotearoa's favourite celebrity-based reality TV survival show.
